amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to carry out sections 8107 and 8108 of the bill which deal with the disposition of detainees held at Guantanamo.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out sections 8107 and 8108.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 249 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moran amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 249 (Roll no. 324).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Moran.
